name: Database for Ammunition Hand Loading
short_description:
A database for keeping track of ammunition hand load information. Useful for record keeping, accuracy tracking and cost calculation.

This project is in its early phases, and I am looking for developers to help out. Please note that the downloadable file is just a prototype that does not do much yet.

The plan is to use java to create a platform independent desktop application that reloaders can use to keep records, print ammunition box labels, and calculate costs.
summary: A database for keeping track of ammunition hand load information.
